alert.note: Alert for Fayette; Haywood; Shelby; Tipton (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 06 at 3:49PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Tipton, northwestern Fayette, southwestern Haywood and northeastern Shelby Counties through 415 PM CDT... At 349 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Munford, or 10 miles northeast of Millington, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Millington, Lakeland, Arlington, Munford, Brighton, Tipton, Atoka, Oakland, Mason, Gallaway, Braden, Barretville, Egypt, Belmont, Redwood, Rosemark, Idaville, Canaan Grove, Longtown and Keeling. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
